sve_fbp_feedback.sve_fbp_wgt_pg_feedback_text: You can contact us about your questions and our program.

sve_abp_about.sve_abp_wgt_pg_about: The application is valid for Anadolu University Open Education Faculty. It asks you for your midterm exam score. It calculates the minimum score you need to get in the final exam. Midterm exam grade is taken as 30 percent and final exam score is 70 percent.

sve_uap_user_agreement.sve_uap_wgt_pg_user_agreement:
1) This application has been developed for Pardus by a software engineer named Ümit Yıldırım, who has a phone number of 0544 525 82 01 and an email address of umityildirim3410@gmail.com. It cannot sold for money.
